backend/cryptoHolding.mo: Defines a CryptoHolding record with id, symbol, amount, invested GBP, and current GBP value.
backend/livePortfolioSnapshot.mo: Defines a LivePortfolioSnapshot with timestamp and total GBP value.
backend/main.mo: Main actor managing user profiles, holdings, rewards, portfolio history, and snapshots with access control.
backend/portfolioHistoryRecord.mo: Defines a portfolio history record with timestamp, total value, and total invested GBP.
backend/portfolioMetrics.mo: Defines portfolio metrics including total value, gain/loss, and percentage change.
backend/stakingReward.mo: Defines a staking reward with id, symbol, amount, and reward date.
backend/timeRange.mo: Defines time range variants for filtering portfolio data.
backend/userProfile.mo: Defines a simple user profile containing a name.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing removal of the staking rewards tab from the dashboard.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains summaries of all frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, and dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/components/AddHoldingDialog: Dialog for adding a crypto holding with symbol suggestions and invested amount input.
frontend/src/components/AddStakingReward: Dialog for adding staking rewards with inputs for symbol, amount, and reward date.
frontend/src/components/EditHoldingDialo: Dialog component allowing users to edit an existing crypto holding with validation and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditStakingRewar: Dialog for editing staking reward details including amount, symbol, and reward date with update mutation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with authentication controls, theme toggle, and user greeting based on Internet Identity.
Manages and displays crypto holdings with sorting, dialogs for CRUD operations, and performance views driven by price data.
frontend/src/components/IncrementHolding: Dialog enabling users to add additional investment to a holding by calculating new totals using live price data.
frontend/src/components/IndividualCrypto: Displays performance metrics and generated chart data for a specific cryptocurrency using holdings, rewards, and price info.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login screen with Internet Identity login and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioChart.t: Generates historical portfolio value data and renders it as a line chart using holdings, rewards, prices, and time range.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioComposi: Builds a pie chart showing portfolio composition by asset value, including staking rewards.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioOvervie: Calculates total portfolio metrics and perâ€‘asset summaries, rendering an overview with price-based valuations.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioPerform: Renders live and historical portfolio performance using area charts with sliding-window live updates.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a form to create a user profile by submitting a name to the backend.
frontend/src/components/StakingRewardsMa: UI component to list, add, edit, and delete staking rewards with price lookup and dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCryptoPrices.ts: Fetches crypto prices using CoinGecko and Revolut mappings with validation for symbols and API responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, holdings, and staking rewards via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with light/dark theme variables, gradients, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard page with portfolio overview and holdings management components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store them in sessionStorage, and retrieve or clear persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, plugins, and content paths using OKLCH variable-driven theming.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature states, and a pending request to remove the staking rewards tab from the UI.
